Instance name: lrc2_4_7
Authors: Piotr Sielski (psielski@emapa.pl), Piotr Cybula, Marek Rogalski, Mariusz Kok, Piotr Beling, Andrzej Jaszkiewicz, Przemysław Pełka.  Emapa S.A. (http://www.emapa.pl)
Date: 2019-11-06
Reference: "Development of universal methods of solving advanced VRP problems with the use of machine learning", unpublished research funded by The National Centre for Research and Development, project number: POIR.01.01.01-00-0012/19.  "Optimization of advanced VRP problem variants", unpublished. Computing grant 358 funded by Poznan Supercomputing and Networking Center.
